This package contains a Zope 3 skin for the WorldCookery application,
the demo application that accompanies Philipp von Weitershausen's book
"Web Component Development with Zope 3, see http://worldcookery.com.
It is also used for the worldcookery.com website itself.

Changes
=======

3.9.1 (2007-09-21)
------------------

Added some missing ZCML dependencies.

3.9 (2007-09-20)
----------------

Now works with Zope 3.4 via eggs.

2.0.1 (2007-02-23)
------------------

Fix minor bug in the namespace package declaration.

2.0 (2006-11-08)
----------------

Initial release as separate package, based on example source code from
WCD 2nd ed.
